ob_02_elinor_002.content: You can move around like this to find them.

ob_02_elinor_003_click.content: Click where you want to go,
or use the arrows to move around.

ob_02_elinor_003_tap.content: Tap where you want to go,
or use the arrows to move around.

ob_02_elinor_005.content: is going to be the next seeker!
